text: Vision of Ezra is the name of an ancient apocryphal text, whose authorship is associated to Ezra, the . The remaining manuscripts are written in Latin and date as of the 11th century, but researches say that the original document must have been written in Greek. Just like the Greek Apocalypse of Ezra, the text shows a clearly Christian origin. ==Other websites== *Vision of Ezra at earlyjewishwritings.com Category:Christian texts Category:11th-century books
title: Vision of Ezra
